Check, verify and validate your card

texxt here

Title text here

text here

How To Check

1 Remove the card from the package

The purpose of removing the card from the package is typically to access the information of the card provided.

2 Peel the seal on the card you removed (if necessary) to see the codes on the card
3 Input the codes correctly on the spaces provided above
4 Click on continue

Once you hit Continue the information you should be forwarded to a page that Show your gift card Verified. If it doesn't work, go back to the last page and enter the card details again. Double-check them to make sure that they are correct before you Submit them
